original_text: Is it any pleasure to the Almighty, that thou art righteous? or is it gain to him, that thou makest thy ways perfect?
korean_text: 네가 의로운들 전능자에게 무슨 기쁨이 있겠으며 네 행위가 온전한들 그에게 무슨 이익이 되겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Is it any pleasure to the Almighty
or is it gain to him
that thou makest thy ways perfect?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 길을 완전하게 만드는 것이
